column5: I took out my sisters boyfriend today as he had never icefished before. We got to miners bay at 10 is and fished till 4:30. We were fishing in about 70ft and ended up catching two in the slot with a ton of misses. All fish were caught on a swivel split shot and a large minnow. Cheers Jeff
Nice! Sounds like a good way to spend a Thursday afternoon. Did the two hit the frying pan?  Cheers, 1leg

there are variety of fish that are go through there at any given time. anything from whitefish, cisco, ling and lakers have all been caught there in one day. Sounds liek you had some great action just some bad luck missing the fish.
Thanks for the report Jeff. I used to get up there all the time fishing, nice to hear there's still a few being caught.
Good job bud. Hows the ice up that way any slush on top? we'll get after em again soon. cheers
